title: Craniofrontonasal Dysplasia (CFND) Clinical Overview
short_description: Clinical document describing CFND, a rare genetic disorder with more severe manifestations in females than males.
long_description: This clinical document provides information about Craniofrontonasal Dysplasia (CFND), a very rare genetic disorder characterized by distinctive craniofacial abnormalities. The document highlights the unusual pattern of this X-linked condition where females are more severely affected than males, contrary to typical X-linked inheritance patterns. This paradoxical inheritance pattern makes CFND a unique genetic disorder requiring specialized clinical understanding for proper diagnosis and management.
